attributes.action: Stop the 30 point deduction handed to Luton town fc by the Football league.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As part of the footballing community I feel it is unjustified that a club can be given this sort of punishment. The football association are inconsistent and don't give the same punishment to the so called top teams in the English league. Luton Town fc has been given very harsh treatment. The Football association should be helping these sort of clubs not giving them massive punishments that can ultimatly end in Luton Town Fc folding. 

Here is a link of the story: http://www.skysports.com/story/0,19528,11095_3802512,00.html

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Football Association.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
